TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManagementNameAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ManagementNameAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ManagementNameAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary:
The ManagementName attribute is used to override names exposed through a WMI class.
Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries. The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

Docs.param: The user-friendly name for the object.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified name.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the user-friendly name for an object. The object can be a method parameter or properties marked with the ManagementProbe, ManagementKey, or ManagementConfiguration attributes.
Docs.value: A value that indicates the user friendly name for an object.
